text: Very good comfort and very kind service in this modern hotel, very close to Chennai Airport.
The service and restaurants are excellent, especially like the Samudra restaurant providing lots of tempting alternatives.
Often travel to Chennai on business and this was the first time I tried the Trident, Chennai. I'll be staying here on all future trips. Excelllent service and the food was terrific.

The ambiance of the restaurants is very poor, Cinnamon is more laid back, Samudra is more exclusive. Food is excellent and of course with Trident totally safe. Staff are very warm and welcoming. The rooms are not brand new.
